hobbies.title: Sing
hobbies.text: I take singing lessons and I play with a band. We don't have a portfolio yet, but hopefully we will soon!

hobbies.title: Play piano
hobbies.text: Yes! I do like playing piano. I'm a self taught, but I can play with friends

hobbies.title: Paddle
hobbies.text: I'm a paddle player. I use to compete in tournaments on weekends!
